sentence: And Trump jumped very late onto the bandwagon of gubernatorial hopeful Doug Mastriano in Pennsylvania, but I doubt many will attribute much of his 44% showing to the last-minute endorsement.
author: Jonathan Bernstein
title: GOP voters aren't Trump zombies

sentence: The former President waited until later in the campaign to throw his weight behind Vance in Ohio and gubernatorial candidate Doug Mastriano in Pennsylvania, and he would be late to intervene if he endorses Britt or Durant in Alabama in the coming days.
author: Gabby Orr
title: Trump may hold off on more endorsements for coming primaries, advisers say

sentence: Trump boasted another win with the victory of state Sen. Doug Mastriano, an additional endorsement that roiled some Pennsylvania Republicans due to the candidate's extreme views.
author: Grace Panetta
title: Trump may stop endorsing candidates for competitive GOP primaries, report says: 'This is not how he expected this to go'
